beforeVoiceLines.name: Prize Roulette Voice 1
beforeVoiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 24
text: What do you think?[r]Is there anything you want in the roulette?

What do you think?
Is there anything you want in the roulette?

afterVoiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 30

The moment we've all been waiting for!

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 1
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
Did you collect some True Manuscripts?
Well, welcome to Da Vinci's wonderful Prize Roulette.
I'm hoping you get good prizes!

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 2
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Good job! Yes, yes, steadily working to collect is the quickest path to greatness.
Along with the usual admiration, shall we go all out?

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 3
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
Welcome, welcome.
I've been waiting for you.
Come on now, spin that roulette!

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 4
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
When was the last time you checked out the news updates?
You may not think too much about them normally, but there's important information there.
You should check it out once in a while.

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 5
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hello there. Or is it good evening?
Probably not good if you don't even know what time it is.
It's great that you're so diligently collecting manuscripts, but it's bad for your health not to rest. Don't push yourself too hard.

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 6
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 6
voiceLines.subtitle:
Oh, welcome...
Do you still have some manuscripts?
You do know that this is the True Manuscript Roulette,
right?

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 7
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
All the hustle and bustle of an event keeps me busy while it's going on, but once it's all over, it's a little sad.
...Do you feel the same way?

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 8
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 8
voiceLines.subtitle:
Are you going to spin the prize roulette? Or exchange items?
There's not much time left, so I suggest you use up any remaining manuscripts. 
Oh, but be careful! You're in the True Manuscript exclusive shop!

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 11
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 9
voiceLines.subtitle:
Welcome☆
This is the special Da Vinci Prize Roulette, exclusive for Fake Manuscripts. The more you collect, the more you can roll. So keep on gathering them! Don't miss your big chance! Call now...! Uh, do people still say that?

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 12
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 10
voiceLines.subtitle:
Welcome home, dear.
Did you collect any manuscripts? Lots? Oh, how splendid! Now, keep spinning that roulette!

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 13
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 11
voiceLines.subtitle:
Even fake things have some value to them.
It's true.
...Specifically, the more Fake Manuscripts you collect, the more you can spin for the prize roulette!
So let's get to it with some enthusiasm!

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 14
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 12
voiceLines.subtitle:
Have you been checking out the news?
There's no point in posting information if you don't read it.
I recommend you check it out once in a while.

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 15
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 13
voiceLines.subtitle:
Here you go. Grab up as many prizes as you like.
Maybe you'll get something good.
Or are you just going to buy out the entire prize lineup?

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 16
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 14
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hm...?
Don't worry, the Prize Roulette is still going.
The event may have ended, but I haven't closed shop yet.

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 17
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 15
voiceLines.subtitle:
Yep, yep, the Prize Roulette, right?
Do you still have some manuscripts left? The fake ones.
If you don't have any...teehee... So you just came to visit me while I'm trying to close up shop? I like that.
I'll have you help me clean up. Or...yeah, you want to have tea with me?

voiceLines.name: About the Event (Second Block) 18
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 16
voiceLines.subtitle:
I'm going to start shutting down the prize system.
You should go ahead and exchange all the manuscripts you have left before I do.
If not, then all your hard work and battling will go to waste.

voiceLines.name: Shop Voice (Second Block) 1
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 17
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hello, welcome to Da Vinci's Exchange Shop.
Have you gathered any manuscripts? True or fake, I'm happy with either! I can use both!

voiceLines.name: Shop Voice (Second Block) 2
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 18
voiceLines.subtitle: This is my special gift exchange system. Since this is a revival, I tweaked the lineup just a LITTLE bit.

voiceLines.name: Shop Voice (Second Block) 11
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 22
voiceLines.subtitle:
The fun of this all too brief event is about to come to an end.
Da Vinci's special shop rerun version is closing soon.
I'm still exchanging items, so get what you can while the getting's good!

voiceLines.name: Shop Voice (Second Block) 12
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 23
voiceLines.subtitle:
Thank you for your patronage.
It's time for me close up shop.
Don't forget to exchange all the manuscripts you have, whether they be genuine or fake, okay?

Have you gathered any manuscripts? True or fake, I'm happy with either! I can use both!

voiceLines.name: Shop Voice (Second Block) 2
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 18
voiceLines.subtitle: This is my special gift exchange system. Since this is a revival, I tweaked the lineup just a LITTLE bit.

voiceLines.name: Shop Voice (Second Block) 3
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 19

I have some very rare and hard to get items on offer!
Go nuts and get everything!

voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 20
voiceLines.subtitle:
What's that? You want all this in my regular lineup?
Sorry, but Chaldea's resources are limited.
That's why I'm being so generous right now☆

voiceLines.name: Shop Voice (Second Block) 5
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 21
voiceLines.subtitle:
Here you go.
Nothing in my shop is useless.
Be diligent in your exchanging!

voiceLines.name: Shop Voice (Second Block) 11
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 22
voiceLines.subtitle:
The fun of this all too brief event is about to come to an end.
Da Vinci's special shop rerun version is closing soon.
I'm still exchanging items, so get what you can while the getting's good!

voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: Da Vinci and the 7 Counterfeit Heroic Spirits - Lite 23
voiceLines.subtitle:
Thank you for your patronage.
It's time for me close up shop.
Don't forget to exchange all the manuscripts you have, whether they be genuine or fake, okay?
